      • draw

        int alpha)
        Draws this button on the argument canvas.

      • contains

        boolean contains(PointF point)
        Returns whether this button contains the argument point.
        Parameters:
        point - the point to be tested
        Returns:
        true if the (x, y) point is within this button's coordinates

      • setPosition

        void setPosition(Rect position,
               RectF hitArea)
        Sets this button's position.

        Not to be used from within BubbleMenu class.

        Parameters:
        position - this button's position
        hitArea - the area that triggers this button
